create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts music visualizer
Primary request: High-energy opening for a philosophical rap short about seeking knowledge.
Scene/background: neon city rooftop at blue hour blending into abstract cosmic geometry
Subject: glowing sound-wave rings and floating geometric symbols
Action: 0-4s bass-synced light flashes; 4-8s symbols build into lotus-like pattern; 8-12s camera punches into luminous core
Camera: vertical 9:16, dynamic push-ins, beat-timed cuts every 1-2 seconds
Lighting/mood: high-contrast neon with warm edge light and light haze
Color palette: cyan, amber, black, magenta accent
Style/format: contemporary trap aesthetic fused with spiritual futurism; abstract animation style
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack; no generated dialogue
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no text overlays, no real humans, no specific copyrighted characters
Avoid: flicker, motion jitter, text artifacts, logos, watermarks
